title: Ticket #7268: Incorrect description of WRITE access level WRT startd
description:
In the manual section Administrator's Manual -> Security -> HTCondor's Security Model -> Access Level Descriptions -> STARTD -> WRITE: 

WRITE

All commands that relate to a condor_schedd daemon claiming
a machine, starting jobs there, or stopping those jobs.

According to Zach Miller this is incorrect, and pertains to the DAEMON access level instead of WRITE.

Link to the manual page in question -> https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/en/v8_8_3/admin-manual/security.html#access-level-descriptions

Link to the RT ticket in which this topic was discussed -> https://crt.cs.wisc.edu/rt/Ticket/Display.html?id=97540
creator: moate
